name: express_postresql_api
description: express application that works in tandem with postgres to provide a backend api for a CMS frontend app

scripts.init:cache: npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only server:cache:listener --silent && node cache/_global/notify.js && pm2 stop all
scripts.reinit:cache: npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only server:cache:listener --silent && node cache/_global/notify.js
scripts.server:start: docker start redis-container && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.server:stop: docker stop redis-container && npx pm2 stop all
scripts.server:restart: docker restart redis-container && npx pm2 restart all

author: Andraz Furlan
